title: Sterling Food Court
typeOfFood: Lacto, Indian, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Part of a conglomerate. Has daal that's vegan, vegetable samosas, and plain rice. If you are on a long layover, show your boarding pass and you should get a free meal. Free Wi-Fi everywhere and 4 computers to use for free standing up by Costa Coffee which has vegan flapjacks and apples.
